channel.description:

[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/j0xids.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/161mbn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/6h0xgp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/x3d279.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2efnhnp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/3532jyb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2944h1u.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/23r1n6b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/6qh5og.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2rq1xn6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/34yekv8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/21bqsl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vdzvkg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/209gdio.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/D4hKA2.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/FnCUWI.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/Ia5mtn.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/3Khzro.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/tqQ9Df.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/QYIBEt.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/hLnEMq.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/epwtfl.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/skNIhy.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/CkgTUl.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/gqpswx.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/Nh0b3M.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/a0prc0.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/bGkdDN.png[/img] [IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/ZlCDBP.png[/img]
Features: [COLOR="Lime"]-Skin colors -Animated Nex -8+ bosses :Teh pro,Avatar of destruction,Nex,Nomad,Snake queen,KBD,Lakhra and alot more... -Fixed all dungeoneering bugs -ALL dupes fixed -DFS making -Upgrading items -Lottery -Unique custom home -mem leaks,deadlocks fixed -Fully working Leeches,soul split -New gameframe -Zombie minigame -Castle wars -602 Skill Interface -Fading Hitmarks -Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses. -Combat Icons Next to Damage -Dungeoneering FLAWLESS (8 GOOD Floors) -All Important Summoning Special Attacks -Very Advanced Dicing System -10Man "Raid" Style Bosses -Nomad -Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking -Wilderness Revernants -Custom PK'ing Skill -Elite Slayer Tasks -All NPC's around the World -More Advanaced Skilling than PI -FULLY working Overloads 100% RS -39 Jad Waves, Custom -Unique Custom Home -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! -PKP Shops -90% Corrected Item Stats -Even More NPC Anims Added -Player Owned Shops -Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Vote4Cash Integrated -Fully Webclient Ready -Soulwars Cape & More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -Critical Hits (With RS Hitsplat) -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Instant Loading (Was very slow with base) -Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects -Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces -317 Classic RS Graphics -Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED -602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -Donaters FUNPK Area -Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding) -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring -Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server! -Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild) -Very customisabled source files, as written in PI / DSPK style. -Real RS Barrage Orb's for non freezing barrages.[/COLOR]
Credits: [COLOR="DarkOrchid"]Donthate (fixed deadlock) House (cleaned up server & fixed bounty hunter) Quadro7 (custom maps) Hybrid PvP Theholygrail artem ExPK Dylan Erased Pkz Brian's Inc™ Faris & James Satan666 ombargains Xaves Nationscape puretarget amigosz chri55w 'Zant project fatality [/COLOR]

item.description:
@Hunnids wrote:

[quote=“Demon6994, post:12, topic:438326”][quote author=Hunnids link=topic=541041.msg3963768#msg3963768 date=1333508647]
theres many things wrong with this… like

theres a boss point shop that is for the dominion tower witch isnt finished… the player handler is all messed up you cant see anyone else when they go off mini map and the donator tab is allll messed up… the animations are messed up… the santa on donator island ask you to get his puppets and you cant get the blue one… just theres alot of work to do on this…
[/quote]

I don’t think he’s going to ‘spoon’ feed this shit to you. Do some work yourself. Leecher. And to solve your player problem. RESTART THE SERVER. Because i’m using this right now, and it’s working just fine.

OFF TOPIC.

I wonder why he got muted. O.o[/quote]

alright have fun noob… i fixed all that shit so have fun!!

Read full topic

item.description:
@bahaaX5 wrote:

[SIZE=“5”][SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Red”]Vernix-PKz Released By Bahaa[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SIZE]

[COLOR=“Magenta”]STABLE VERSION OF THIS SOURCE

http://uppit.com/bv8qstoorr7n/vernix-pkzv7.rar _
___________________________________________[/COLOR]

j0xids.png761×502

161mbn.png760×504

6h0xgp.png765×506

x3d279.png762×505

2efnhnp.png763×502
























Features:
[COLOR=“Lime”]-Skin colors
-Animated Nex
-8+ bosses :Teh pro,Avatar of destruction,Nex,Nomad,Snake queen,KBD,Lakhra and alot more…
-Fixed all dungeoneering bugs
-ALL dupes fixed
-DFS making
-Upgrading items
-Lottery
-Unique custom home
-mem leaks,deadlocks fixed
-Fully working Leeches,soul split
-New gameframe
-Zombie minigame
-Castle wars
-602 Skill Interface
-Fading Hitmarks
-Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses.
-Combat Icons Next to Damage
-Dungeoneering FLAWLESS (8 GOOD Floors)
-All Important Summoning Special Attacks
-Very Advanced Dicing System
-10Man “Raid” Style Bosses
-Nomad
-Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking
-Wilderness Revernants
-Custom PK’ing Skill
-Elite Slayer Tasks
-All NPC’s around the World
-More Advanaced Skilling than PI
-FULLY working Overloads 100% RS
-39 Jad Waves, Custom
-Unique Custom Home
-Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging!
-100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)!
-PKP Shops
-90% Corrected Item Stats
-Even More NPC Anims Added
-Player Owned Shops
-Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded
-PERFECT Bridding / Switching
-Vote4Cash Integrated
-Fully Webclient Ready
-Soulwars Cape & More Items Added
-Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect’s)
-Critical Hits (With RS Hitsplat)
-Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated
-Instant Loading (Was very slow with base)
-Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects
-Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces
-317 Classic RS Graphics
-Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces
-NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE
-Working Spirit Shield Effects
-Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects
-Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields
-NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED
-602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters
-Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother!
-Donaters FUNPK Area
-Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding)
-Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP
-Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server
-Near Flawless Combat System
-Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow
-Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring
-Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server!
-Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild)
-Very customisabled source files, as written in PI / DSPK style.
-Real RS Barrage Orb’s for non freezing barrages.[/COLOR]

Credits:
[COLOR=“DarkOrchid”]Donthate (fixed deadlock)
House (cleaned up server & fixed bounty hunter)
Quadro7 (custom maps)

project fatality
[/COLOR]
